departure_format.title: Departure Format
departure_format.description:
Customize departure display format.

Available placeholders:
{route} - route number
{headsign} - destination
{time} - departure time (HH:MM)
{scheduled_time} - scheduled time (HH:MM)
{minutes} - minutes until departure
{delay} - delay in minutes
{vehicle_code} - vehicle number
{vehicle_properties_icons} - vehicle amenity icons
{realtime} - real-time data (True/False)

Default: {route} ‚Üí {headsign} | {time} ({minutes} min)
